CustomField.description: Formula field to download & open content files
CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(refedge__Content_URL__c), IF(ISBLANK(refedge__Content_ID__c), 'No content found to open or download', HYPERLINK('/apex/' + $Setup.refedge__POR_App_Configuration__c.refedge__Namespace__c + 'DownloadLinkPage?Id=' + Id + '&ContentId=' + refedge__Content_ID__c, IMAGE("/resource/" + $Setup.refedge__POR_App_Configuration__c.refedge__Namespace__c + "DownloadImage", "Download"), "_blank")), HYPERLINK('/apex/' + $Setup.refedge__POR_App_Configuration__c.refedge__Namespace__c + 'DownloadLinkPage?Id=' + Id + '&ContentURL=' + refedge__Content_URL__c, IMAGE("/resource/" + $Setup.refedge__POR_App_Configuration__c.refedge__Namespace__c + "OpenImage", "Open"), "_blank"))
CustomField.label: Content Document
